metadata.title: CVE-2012-3155 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in the CORBA ORB component in Sun GlassFishEnterprise Server 2.1.1, Oracle GlassFish Server 3.0.1 and 3.1.2, and SunJava System Application Server 8.1 and 8.2 allows remote attackers toaffect availability, related to CORBA ORB.

criterions.comment: glassfish package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
